Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: luvgatlinburg
Reviews.Content: We stayed here the last week of June. Clean, friendly "old Florida" atmosphere. The complimentary newspaper delivered to your door is a nice touch. Great customer service. Only negatives - the front room of suite was a little too warm [air conditioner is in bedroom] and front room could use some more seating[re-arranging?]. Improvements are being made and so far look great. Would gladly stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Best affordable family vacation around.”
Reviews.Author: 502jane
Reviews.Content: This is our favorite place to stay in Daytona and we have tried many. Laid-back atmosphere with lots of families, clean pool, great beach access and rooms to fit our needs year to year. Next year is a visit with extended family and we will stay here. The management is helpful and the staff friendly.

Reviews.Title: “found a gem”
Reviews.Author: Nannette G
Reviews.Content: quite and cozy. great romance spot. lots of charm and lovely grounds. Customer service great , treated like an old friend.

Reviews.Title: “A tale of bygone glory days”
Reviews.Author: fishribs
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the the Shoreline Inn and the Cabana Colony Cottages many times over the last 15 years. What I loved about it: the cottages were built in 1927, on the beach, it was a taste of old Florida, well maintained, on-premises 24 hour management available. Kay ran the property and was one of the best things about it. She wanted you to come back again and again. It was a place where you felt like family. My husband and I stayed there recently and were disappointed. The property was not maintained as well. The grass had overgrown the walkways to the cabins. There was no round the clock management on property. There seemed to be projects that had been started but remained unfinished: painting exterior walls and building some sort of deck. A few of the beach umbrellas were broken. The rocking chair outside our room came unglued and broke apart when used. We were charged a high rate even though it was evident the inn was far from fully booked. The doorknob on our cottage failed and we were trapped in our room twice. The front desk manager offered us a late check out but we declined. I guess time moves on and so must we. I will miss you Shoreline.

Reviews.Title: “Four Years Consecutive”
Reviews.Author: Gunny214
Reviews.Content: This is our fourth year in a row here and it just keeps getting better. This is the first time we have stayed somewhere where the owners walk the property daily and inquire about your stay and make sure you are comfortable and that the stay is enjoyable. The staff goes above and beyond to make you feel at home and that all your needs are benig met. They treat you like they've known you forever and you could not feel more welcomed. The lawn and surroundings are immaculate as are the rooms and other facilities. And once again, the swimming pool and deck could not be cleaner and more inviting. The really exciting thing about this place, is that the owners are working on constant improvements to everything, from interior comfort to outside surroundings. A great Place that should be how Daytona Beach is defined for true Family comfort.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely!”
Reviews.Author: Chitavita
Reviews.Content: Our family love Shoreline All Suites Inn and Cabana Colony Cottages! We're coming there for a vacation for at least every other year for more than 20 years!!! It's a great location, wonderful place fo relax, very nice people. We're looking forward to go there again this year.

Reviews.Title: “Looking forward to a return trip”
Reviews.Author: DCapeCod
Reviews.Content: Loved this place, our room was comfortable and clean. The ocean view was beautiful and relaxing. The staff were helpful and friendly. Great place if you have kids. This will be the first place I book when coming back to Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful views and relaxing atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: Wendy-n-Tom
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a relaxing place to spend a vacation on the beach, this is the place! I had a very enjoyable and comfortable stay at one of the Beachfront Cottages. It was a pleasure to not have to deal with the inconveniences that come along with a large hotel. Staying at the Beachfront Cottage was almost like having your very own private residence on the beach. The cottage sits on an awesome oceanfront location with great views of the Atlantic Ocean. It was also nice to wake up to the sound of the waves. The cottage was very well kept and clean. Inside you’ll find a nice bed, table and chairs, reclining chair and flat screen tv. The bathroom is roomy and the kitchen has all that you will need. You can open the two nice sized windows to let in the fresh air and sounds of the ocean. Outside each cottage are two rocking chairs where you can sit and enjoy the view. There are also two lounge chairs outside each cottage where you can lie in the sun while sipping a tropical drink. If you don’t feel like eating out, you can cook in the kitchen or go outside and cook one of the propane grilles. The pool and patio area is large and well kept with plenty of lounge chairs and tables where you can enjoy the pool and the view of the ocean. The staff was great to deal with and was attentive to any need. I also left behind some clothing and they called to let me know and made arrangements to have the clothes shipped home to me. I highly recommend Shoreline and will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “great place to relax and unwind!”
Reviews.Author: louisdarke
Reviews.Content: great place to relax and unwind. very clean cottage and well maintained property. check in was super easy and very friendly. great location, that is steps from the sand. very nice pool area, and plenty of chairs and tables to relax by. everything is within walking distance or a quick drive. if you are looking for a nice place to stay, with you better half, or even your family, this is a nice choice. it is a nice option, to the cookie cutter mega hotels, and chains, if you want something different, and something that makes you feel like you stepped away from the rat race, and back to a quieter, more simple time, this is a neat alternative.

Reviews.Title: “Great place”
Reviews.Author: Jane B
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 5 weeks and we enjoyed every minute! The layout of this place is great.We enjoyed the heated pool, friendly and helpful staff and clean cottage and clean and reasonable laundry facilities.We would recomend this place to everyone! Jane Bosworth Ohio

Reviews.Title: “Authentic Florida Feeling!”
Reviews.Author: Sean G
Reviews.Content: Very great place to stay, the owners and staff are extremely friendly, and they make you feel right at home. They are always there to help you, I think that everyone should check this place out!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: babylass
Reviews.Content: If there was a ten star rating I would give this hotel. This is truly a home away from home. I can tell you it is not the most fancy physically beautiful place I have ever been but it is the most happy place. I have travelled a lot and have never been to a most genuinely happy place. Everyone is very friendly. The beach view is wonderful. It is a beach front property. i stayed in the garden view apartment and I can tell you that you will not miss that you are not on the beach front because the beach it is only steps away. They have barbeque grills you can just roll to you apartment doors and use which we did. The owners are super nice people and is so welcoming it is just unbelievable. We met people who have been coming here for years and just say all wonderful things and I see why. You are blessed to find this place. This is how all of us in our group felt.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value, comfortable, and charming!”
Reviews.Author: Joeker277
Reviews.Content: We were lucky to find this place on the Superior Small Lodging site. It’s a unique motel; actually, I think it was two properties that are now owned and operated as one. A terrific young couple runs the place and you feel like you’re really cared for. They also have a beautiful puppy—almost full grown when we were there. If you’re a fan of cookie-cutter hotel rooms and “full service,” this is not the place for you. But if you like charm and space, check it out. We stayed in one of the cottages. It has a full kitchen, very comfortable beds, ceiling fans, and a roomy stall shower. The bathroom sink is in the bedroom area, which works well for my sister and me when we travel together. The pool and grounds are nicely kept, and the owners have plans for improvements as time goes on. Since most of the small, non-chain motels in the Daytona area have closed in the past couple of years, we’ll definitely come back to the Shoreline. (This property is in the Daytona Beach Shores area, which is the southern, quieter, safer end of Daytona Beach.)

Reviews.Title: “Christmas vacation”
Reviews.Author: NashportSheila
Reviews.Content: My family has fell in love with this place, we are a farm family from Ohio we love the beach and swimming this place has it all for us , plus it's relaxing.And it's a great place to head for Christmas , and we just booked again for 2011 yea!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay”
Reviews.Author: Rev84
Reviews.Content: My family and I have always had a wonderful stay at Shoreline. The children always enjoyed the large pool and beach and my wife and I have always been pleased with the accommodations and staff. While our children have all grown up this September was no different as my wife and I celebrated our 30 year of marriage by staying in one of the cozy cottages facing the ocean. WHAT A VIEW! Things continue to improve under the new owners who have a desire to make it an exceptional place for all who wish to stay - the owners have even moved into the hotel to gain first hand knowledge of what their guest experience. It was a very pleasing sight to notice the owner HIMSELF working outside on a recently built retaining wall. I must say after 30 years of coming down to Daytona this was the first time I ever witness the ownership where we have stayed take such an active part in the work going on at their pace of business. We have already made our reservations for next year. Can't wait!

Reviews.Title: “Great for Family get together”
Reviews.Author: bonnieb222
Reviews.Content: We stay at the Daytona Shoreline & Cabana Colony Cottages every year for our family birthday get together. Everyone loves the uniqueness of the facilities. We have stayed in both the suites and cottages and they fill all of our needs. Great location and fantastic pool area which overlooks the ocean. We make use of the barbeque grills and enjoy cooking our dinner poolside and saving money from eating out. Overall a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “the best place to stay ever !”
Reviews.Author: maryanne r
Reviews.Content: We have been coming to Shorline for almost 14 years now. We love the privacy, and family authmosphere. Every year when we come back we can catch up with many friends that we have met while on vacation here also and also make new ones. Its is like having an extended family away from New York. We look forward to returning again in November of this year

Reviews.Title: “Unique Daytona Property”
Reviews.Author: fatbobOrlando
Reviews.Content: We prefer to stay in small non chain properties whenever we can and the Shoreline fits the bill in Daytona Beach. While the ownership changed recently we found the front desk and housekeeping staff to be friendly and helpful. The one bedroom suite was clean and well supplied with all the items necessary for a self catering holiday. However, the loveseat in the living room was stained and the frig looked like it had been well used, both could stand to be replaced. Also a ceiling fan would be a welcomed addition in the living area. The pool was large and appeared to be well maintained. The grounds and landscaping could also use some attention and upgrading. If your looking for an non-chain spot the Shoreline would be a good choice.

Reviews.Title: “the Shoreline is "same time next year"...my most favorite place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: MJ B
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Shoreline for many years, in the same cottage which faces the Atlantic Ocean. The service has always been excellent and I feel like when I stay at The Shoreline, I am returning to visit good friends. Everyone from the owner to the maid who brings my towels on a daily basis is incredbily friendly and personable. My cottage is impecably clean and the grounds and pool are beautifully maintained. I feel so lucky and blessed to have found this little jewel on Daytona Beach. When I checkout every year to return to Nashville, I immediately start to count the days til the next check-in!

Reviews.Title: “wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: Randy S
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at various small hotels in Daytona for the past 30 years and have found the Shoreline Inn one of the finest. We always have had a wonderful experience in times past as a family and now as empty nesters when we have stayed at the Shoreline. The staff tries hard to accommodate you with whatever need you may have and the furnishings are pleasant. Looking forward to staying there this September.

Reviews.Title: “Love this place!”
Reviews.Author: SusanHoff
Reviews.Content: My family has been coming to Shoreline Inn for years and we love it. We would never consider staying anywhere else! The rooms are nice, the grounds are beautiful and the staff is exceptional! It's definitely a jewel on the beach!

Reviews.Title: “Our favorite place to stay in Daytona.”
Reviews.Author: MimiBecky
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have been staying at the Shoreline for about five years now. We don't even look at other lodging. Why would we when we just love this place? It is small enough to not be so crowded yet big enough to provide everything we need. We especially love the beachfront cottages. In August, 2010, we were blessed to be able to vacation with our entire family--two sons, their wives, and our two grandchildren. We had a wonderful time together as a family and can't wait to do it all over again in the summer of 2011. In fact we booked the same three rooms. See you soon. Becky from Tennessee

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, and great view!”
Reviews.Author: eallen
Reviews.Content: We travel to Daytona every fall and normally stay at larger hotel properties, but were very impressed with the Shoreline. We have looked at it many times from just next door and always wondered what it would be like, so we tried it this past fall and were really impressed! So impressed that I just booked our return trip today. We stayed in a Couple Cottage ocean front and really enjoyed the unit. It was clean, comfortable, and gave us just enough privacy, which you definately don't get on a hotel balcony. The unit had an unobstructed view of the beach and we kept the windows open at night to hear the waves crash. Everyone from the office staff to the housekeepers were friendly and accommodating. Staying at a small property like this one makes you feel like you are family, not just another guest. Our favorite amenity is the pool and pool deck. We spent countless hours sun bathing and enjoying the beautiful pool and surrounding views. Always clean and never crowded!! Can't wait to return in a couple of months!!

Reviews.Title: “The best place to stay for a relaxed, comfortable, welcoming beach environment”
Reviews.Author: Outdoorfun2
Reviews.Content: We are from pioneer families in Florida that have been here since before it became a State. While growing up we were always thrilled to come to the beach. In those days, Daytona Beach was not littered by high rise hotels and condos. The typical hotel/motel was one or two stories, family owned, clean and had a family environment where people could come truly enjoy the beach. Several years ago we were fortunate to find the Shoreline while looking for something that still might exist in Daytona that was like it used to be. We have stayed countless times here and when we stay at the beach this is our place. We would highly recommend it to couples, families and anyone that would like just a nice place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Cant wait to return!!!”
Reviews.Author: tynkerbell7
Reviews.Content: We, too have stayed at the Shoreline for as many as ten years, and can not wait to return this year, We have 11 days and a wake up before we arrive and I think I am more excited than the kids this year! hands down you will not find a better place to stay with friendlier people!! hoping that Frank shows up while we vist, But REALLY excited to meet the new owners!!! BEST part of our trip is that we meet our dearest friends from Orlando, and we get to spend the whole week catching up!! The BEACH, the SUN, the HOTEL......ahhhhh take me away!!!! Bryan and Kristen Hiatt

Reviews.Title: “Old Florida Charm”
Reviews.Author: Mystery111
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Shoreline each summer for the past 10 yrs. It is a charming place that is Daytona Beach's best kept secret. The Shoreline was owned by Frank and Barbara Molnar, but they have since sold it. i will be spending the 2nd week in July again this year, so I will get to meet the new owners. The Shoreline is very family friendly,clean, and reasonably priced. It is close to restaurants,shopping and attractions. I enjoy the peaceful atmosphere and the old quaint florida charm. I hope my vacation this year is as memorable as the last 10. I would highly reccomend this Hotel to anyone looking for the bbet kept secret in town!!!

Reviews.Title: “Once Again, A Great Place !”
Reviews.Author: Gunny214
Reviews.Content: This was our third year in a row at the Shoreline and it could not have been better. The rooms were immaculate as was the swimming pool and grounds. The staff was over the top friendly and courteous and very kind to the kids. Our grand daughter couldn't wait to get to the office every morning for cup cakes and her Granma's coffee and chat with Corrine. This has to be one of the most welcoming facilities on Daytona Beach Shores if not the very best. Thanks to Shoreline for a great family vacation !

Reviews.Title: “It's like coming home!”
Reviews.Author: kittenchee
Reviews.Content: I have been coming to the Shoreline since I was a small child. My family vacationed here almost every year while I was growing up and they where also coming here before I was born. I like the cabins and the fact you don't have to ride elevators or go up and down steps everything is right there. I really like the fact you can cook in your rooms or go out you have the choice. I started about 6 years ago taking my children to the shoreline and they now come there when they are in florida. I really like the quaint feeling and the quiet you get there. Will continue to come there for many years to come.

Reviews.Title: “Have been returning for years!”
Reviews.Author: afile72
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love the hotel. Rooms are very convient to the pool and beach. Like many other reviews our family has been going to same hotel for many years. Really love the convience of kitchenette, location, and family friendly atmosphere. Will be going back for many more years to come :)

Reviews.Title: “The most wonderful and charming place in Daytona Beach!”
Reviews.Author: Rach2054
Reviews.Content: My family has been vacationing with at Shoreline for over 30 years. I can remember going when I was a little girl and actually learning to swim in their pool by the ocean. I have literally never had one bad experience while staying at the Shoreline. The rooms are always very clean, the staff is extremely helpful and friendly, and we always end up making great new friends each year! I suggest staying in the Cabanas, although the entire property is wonderful. I just love the quaint, homey feel of the cabanas and that it's like having your own little house right on the ocean. If you plan on staying in Daytona Beach, plan on staying at The Shoreline for sure!

Reviews.Title: “A small slice of heaven”
Reviews.Author: vbeysiegel
Reviews.Content: My husband & I come to Daytona twice a year. We have been coming to Shoreline All Suites Inn for the last 5 years, in the spring & late summer. We love being able to walk out of our room on to the thick St. Augustine grass. The staff & housekeeping are very helpful and cater to all our needs. The rates are very competitive and a great bang for the buck. We will be staying at Shoreline for many years to come.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful fun and relaxing place to stay”
Reviews.Author: HowardDebbieGilbert
Reviews.Content: My husband and i stayed here a few years back and loved the pool and white beaches so close. Very clean rooms. We are coming back and bringing a friend. Looking forward to our 5 night stay next week.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!!”
Reviews.Author: milemarker14770
Reviews.Content: The Shoreline is a GREAT family place......next to the pool and the beach! We love the fact we do not have to go up and down stairs to get to the pool or beach....at the Shoreline, you are right there. Plus, with a kitchen, bbq, and laundry....the only place you really need to go to is the grocery store. The staff at the Shoreline are very welcoming.....providing coffee and goodies each morning. You couldn't ask for better family oriented accommodations.

Reviews.Title: “Just a few steps to the ocean from your room.”
Reviews.Author: Alanaaliff
Reviews.Content: We have 4 generations that have been going here and love it. The family run Inn is what we love about it. We feel we know them and they do send us a Christmas card every year. I hope they stay for many more years. Tall Hotels are not family friendly they this place is.

Reviews.Title: “The ONLY place to stay in Daytona!!”
Reviews.Author: Mamato4Monsters
Reviews.Content: I've been coming to Daytona for the last 25 years.. I started this vacation as a child and have continued it with my own family and children. There is NO WHERE else we'd rather stay than Shoreline All Suites Inn! They have wonderful and accomidating staff, clean rooms, GREAT location, great prices, and the best part... you walk out your door right outside!! No elevators, No hallways.... just sun, pool, and ocean!! The perfect spot for a relaxing vacation!!

Reviews.Title: “Great family place to stay”
Reviews.Author: clm59
Reviews.Content: We have been coming to Daytona Beach since I married my husband 22 years ago. We started in one efficiency his family had stayed in for years. After the Hurricanes they tore our old place down and we had to find a new one. We came across Shoreline and fell in love. We have been coming here once a year for about 5 years. We love the 2 bedroom suite efficiencies. To be able to prepare lunch/breakfast and have the convenience of 2 bedrooms and baths is awesome. The staff is fabulous. The pool is gorgeous and it is right on the beach!! It is a great family hotel!! We will continue to stay here in the future! I highly recommend this hotel

Reviews.Title: “My favorite place to stay in Daytona.”
Reviews.Author: njmnews
Reviews.Content: I have been staying here for years and absolutely love it. Coming here reminds me of how vacations were in the past, laid back, and relaxing. I travel with my parents and they love it here as well. Can't wait to visit again.

Reviews.Title: “GreAT LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: tmccabe2
Reviews.Content: We have stayed her twice and it was a great location. We are heading back here in April. It is a very clean hotel. We recommed if you want to relax and enjoy your vaction.

Reviews.Title: “Family friendly, clean and quiet.”
Reviews.Author: kwakeley
Reviews.Content: This will be our 4th year staying st Shoreline during March/April. We have never had anything but a great time. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Very relaxing time, and rooms are so close to the pool area and beach. A much better stay than the high rise condos. We'll keep going back as long as they're open.

Reviews.Title: “Service above reproach”
Reviews.Author: Imelda74
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel during Speed Week when all hotels in Daytona Beach charge more than they are worth. While I wasn't overly impressed with our lodging, I will tell you, the service we received was exceptional. Our refrigerator wasn't working on a Sunday and the maintenance man wasn't working that day. The front desk gave us a key to another unit to store our groceries and first thing Monday morning, we got a different refrigerator and he checked back to make sure it was working correctly. Every question we had was answered and every request met. Kindness goes a long way in my book!! This lodging isn't fancy but it's clean and right on the ocean, another plus

Reviews.Title: “Kid friendly and great location on beach!”
Reviews.Author: Dianna46
Reviews.Content: We have been coming to Daytona's shoreline for 5 years during March Break. If we're lucky, we catch the last day or so of Bike Week. It is a very exciting time to be in Daytona. The accommodations are perfect for our family/friends. Always enjoy the pool which is ocean side. The dolphins usually are jumping most mornings, and we were lucky enough to witness a gathering of whales right in front last year. The staff are wonderful and very accommodating. The rooms are cleaned daily which is a treat after a long day in the sun. Grocery stores are 5 minutes away, along with party stores, and goofy golfing. Suppers are spent BBQing with friends over an evening beverage while the kids are enjoying the tree fort or one more swim in the heated pool. We love the location and look forward to our home away from home feel the Daytona Shorline provides us with. Thanks for many great vacations. Can't wait to get there. Sincerely Dianna LaMantia

Reviews.Title: “A nice place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Abby189
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have been staying at the Cabana Colony Cottages for almost 15 years and we look forward to returning every year. The rooms are very clean and the grounds are well kept. The staff is very friendly and accomdating. It is a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “What an awesome SURPRISE!”
Reviews.Author: nucmanchh
Reviews.Content: My wife & I travel to DB 3-4x a year to visit family. On this trip we decided to stay on the beach and use it as "home base." It was our 1st stay at Shoreline. What a surprise! Excellence! We stayed on the corner, one bedroom and very private' Love it! Making plans for Oct and Shoreline is in our plans.

Reviews.Title: “The Shoreline All Suites Inn is a friendly, clean, well eqipped place to spend a vacation.”
Reviews.Author: Marcia0140
Reviews.Content: Each May, my husband, sister, and I enjoy spending 2 weeks with the Shoreline All Suites Inn. From the friendly owners and people in the office, to the fully equipped and comfortable facilities, the well maintained grounds, the housekeeping service, the beautiful pool and deck, the continental breakfasts, and the daily newspaper, we look forwrd to spending time in our 'Florida' home away from home each May! We're just sorry we are unable to lengthen our stay each year! Although we have no small children, we feel it is ideal for families as well as retirees like ourselves!

Reviews.Title: “15 years in a row and still amazing!!!”
Reviews.Author: scarp71
Reviews.Content: We have been going to Shoreline for the last 15 years for Spring Break. We have taken our children since they were infants. They are now 15 and 9 years old. This is the best place to stay because of the family friendly environment and very low cost. Very easy access to the heated pool and the beach. We especially enjoy that we don't have to walk through a large hotel or use an elevator to go outside. We would definately recommend this hotel and we look forward to returning every year.

Reviews.Title: “This is a small, clean, modern, hotel that is right on the beach with an accomidating and friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: Scrappy04
Reviews.Content: My favorite part about this hotel is the fact that the heated pool is only a few steps away when I walk of my door. Then a row of patio tables offer the perfect place to sit and read the daily paper that was deliver to my door. The stairs leading directly to the beach are directly to the east of the tables. I do not need to take an elevator to my room nor cross a lobby in wet bathing clothes. The rooms and cabins are clean, comfortable, and recently updated. Each property has a kitchenette with full size stove, fridge, sink and a microwave. The hotel is less than 10 minutes fromt he boardwalk, but the beach is not crowded. There are laundry facilities on the premises. Parking and a continental breakfast are free. Parking is tight. The staff is friendly and efficient. The owners make you feel welcome. The grounds are well manicured and very pretty. Lounge chairs are outside every door and there are several grills IT IS A GREAT PLACE TO JUST RELAX FOR A WEEK OR MONTH. IT IS MY FIRST CHOICE WHEN I COME TO DAYTONA EACH YEAR.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place for Family Re-Union”
Reviews.Author: eclaus1
Reviews.Content: We have rented 9 rooms for our 8 kids and us for the past 3 years. Staff is very accomidating and pleasant to work with. Our 27 grandchildren beg us to return for every next year. Owner allows us to return to same rooms each year so our 8 children know before hand where they will be sleeping. Kids love walking on the beach or just laying around the pool. Daytona has many activities to get all 40 of us entertained. Great place, give it a try.

Reviews.Title: “what an amazing vacation”
Reviews.Author: NCR74
Reviews.Content: Our first trip to Daytona in 2009, we stayed in the cottages, it was an amazingly quaint, romantic place and was very relaxing to wake up each morning to the sights and sounds of the ocean, leaving us in constant awe of the ever changing beauty that God created. Last year, we stayed in a 2 bedroom suite with all the comforts of home. This fall, it's back to the cottages to celebrate our 37th anniversary, and we can't wait. The staff is wonderful, grounds are in excellent condition. We would definitely recommend this Inn for a romantic getaway or family vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Trip. I will ONLY STAY here in DAYTONA”
Reviews.Author: TieTechnology
Reviews.Content: This place I can't say enough about it. The staff is friendly, helpful and I recommend Shoreline All Suites Inn to everyone going to Daytona. I can't waite to stay again soon. My fav.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely fun comfortable and relaxing.”
Reviews.Author: patholland
Reviews.Content: This is the place you want to return to year after year. Grounds and pool area are as inviting as the rooms themselves. You would go a long way to find " management and staff " as friendly , accommodating and helpful as our large "Tamworth family " has found at the Shoreline . We look forward again to the month of March when we pull into that parking lot and everyone joins in until all the vehicles are unloaded.

Reviews.Title: “The Shoreline All Suites Inn was A GREAT FIND!”
Reviews.Author: nsbfl2011
Reviews.Content: I'm not one to take the time to write a review about a Hotel but after my stay at the Shoreline All Suites Inn I felt compelled to do so. My family wanted to take a quick getaway after these past holidays. So we did a search on the web and reviewed the Shoreline All Suites Inn. The pictures and some comments we reviewed sold us to take a chance! It was a chance that turned out to be one of the best places we've stayed at! The Cleanliness, Service, Amenities and Outside Grounds were exceptional! The staff was extremely courteous, but what was key for me was the Pride you could feel from everyone that worked there! The Value exceeded all my expectations! If I can take a great line from a movie "I'll Be Back" Thanks for a very pleasurable getaway! Ken (Florida)

Reviews.Title: “Our winter home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: Mac48332
Reviews.Content: We've been vacationing to Florida every winter since 1995. Stayed at several hotels some satisfying in some ways some not. We kept looking for better. Eight years ago (2003) we discovered Shoreline All Suites Inn. We were greatly impressed, our search is ended, this is it. Given a choice apartment or cabin we chose a beautiful small apartment with a private two bed bedroom. Pluses include, on the ocean, great large heated pool, instant maintenance response, great maid service, friendly and efficient desk clerks, repeat pleasant guest. Did i mention breakfast, internet connection, ..... I can go on and on, I'm late for the barbeque the owner is giving. He puts great effort in keeping the place in top shape, guests and employees happy and is a fair cook. DON'T TAKE MY WORD - CHECK IT OUT YOURSELF

Reviews.Title: “PERFECT BEACH GETAWAY”
Reviews.Author: ljswin
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Shoreline All Suites Inn this last summer was so great. We stayed in one of the oceanfront cottages and got a glimpse of what "old Florida" must have been like. The cottages are so quaint and private. I didn't realize that places like this still existed in the midst of all the modern day hotels. An absolute jewel. Our cottage was the perfect size with a nice kitchen and dining area. Did I mention the "oceanfront view"? Everything was very clean and comfortable. When I needed a few extras in my room I just called the desk and within a few minutes I had everything I requested. The local newspaper is delivered to your door and continental breakfast is available each morning which is a nice treat. I grab my muffin, fruit and coffee and head for the deck overlooking the pool and ocean. We had our own outdoor chairs and loungers right outside our door to use when we weren't in the pool or on the beach. The close proximity to sand and water was definitely the highlight. We have stayed in resorts and while nice it is just not the same experience. With our cottage so close to the beach we wasted no time on walking and waiting for elevators. So much time for swimming and just basking in the sun. Nice heated pool which was always well maintained. Our experience with the staff was great and they were always eager to help. We did have a chance to mingle with some of the other guests and walked away very impressed with how much everyone seemed to be enjoying themselves. We had such a pleasant, relaxing stay and cannot wait to plan our next trip back to our cottage.

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay thru the years”
Reviews.Author: ghardisty3
Reviews.Content: We have gone to this same place for several years with our family. They are the most friendly owners & staff anywhere. Always feel like it's home away from home. Reasonably prices and perfect location for families. We wouldn't consider going anywhere else in Daytona.Looking forward to going again in 2011.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Place and Simple”
Reviews.Author: HAPPYTRAVELLERS87
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Shoreline All Suites Inn for the past 5 years and our family love it! It is great for children not close to any highway for them to run out on too. It has a very private setting to it. The property and rooms are very clean, and the service is great! It has a nice view of the beach and ocean and the pool location is awesome! My 2 girls love it there especially the fresh donuts in the morning and also we like the fresh coffee. The staff are great if you have any problems they will take care of you! thanks Frank and Staff for making our past stays an enjoyable one. We always look forward to our Daytona Trip every year....! Keep it up.

Reviews.Title: “A+ Wonderful accomations, wonderful location, wonderful people!”
Reviews.Author: vickiej02
Reviews.Content: I can not tell how much we look forward to this time of year. We are dairy farmers from upstate New York and come every January to our second home, Cabana Colony Cottages. We have been coming now for three years and have always enjoyed the location, the cleaniness and the wonderful staff! I tell all my co-workers about Shoreline and the wonderful beach and accommodations! Thank you for never changing!

Reviews.Title: “Another great year with the family at the Shoreline !”
Reviews.Author: emilyreilly2
Reviews.Content: Every year, I go to Daytona Beach with my son and my extended family. We have been staying at the Shoreline All Suites Inn for years. It is a super place for kids as we have direct access to the pool and the beach and kids are safe and free to play and have a great time. The staff is friendly and they look forward to us returning every year. The rooms are comfortable and clean and the Shoreline is one of the last family owned hotels in Daytona. The coffee and donuts every morning are great as well !

Reviews.Title: “the best place to stay in daytona beach fl.”
Reviews.Author: cfs45
Reviews.Content: We have been staying here since the 90's. we love the quaintness of the rooms and cottages. Staff is very friendly and courteous. Sitting around the pool is very relaxing. We have made many friends from all over the world by staying here. We come here at least twice yearly.

Reviews.Title: “Best Bang for your Buck”
Reviews.Author: Duker1216
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Shoreline Inn All Suites Inn was enjoyed by our entire Family. The family astmosphere along with the a safe feeling makes our stay relaxing and worry free. Not only is the view of the Ocean worth the long drive from Canada the staff at the Shoreline go out of their way to make us feel at home. We have been enjoying their hospitality for many years and look forward to many more in the upcoming years.

Reviews.Title: “I would choose this place over all others....can[t wait to return”
Reviews.Author: sun2011
Reviews.Content: We feel it was a miracle to locate this lovely place. It is just what we want it to be and more. We spent 31 years in a southern lake resort and feel so very fortunate to replace that experience with THIS one! It is our perfect place.

Reviews.Title: “We stay at teh Shoreline/Cabana Colony Cotages every year becasue it's the absolute best place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: stampersal
Reviews.Content: The staff is friendly and so very helpful. The cottages are spotless. The bed is so comfortable. The ocean sounds are soothing. We won't stay anywhere else - no place could compare to this one. The location is close enough to things to do but far enough away to be quiet. What an absolutely fabulous place to RELAX!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Atmosphere!”
Reviews.Author: SixBlessings
Reviews.Content: Shoreline All Suites Inn/Cabana Cottages is a great place to vacation. Frank , Corrine and the entire staff have always been polite, helpful and very accomodating. We have stayed in the suites as well as in the cabanas. Our last time at the Shoreline was in October of 2010, however, my husband & I have stayed there on numerous occasions (Spring Break, Daytona 500, etc.) over the years. In March, our children and grandchildren also stay at Shoreline. Some of our extended family members have actually vacationed at the Shoreline for the past 25 plus years! It is perfect for family vacations with a genuine family atmosphere! We would truly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Highly comfortable”
Reviews.Author: pats2254
Reviews.Content: Great vacation place - have been going for at tleast 10 years - relaxing & staff is always helpful. Rooms clean & well kept

Reviews.Title: “Classic Daytona Beach Lodging At Its Best”
Reviews.Author: Gunny214
Reviews.Content: If you're traveling to Daytona for the first time or if this is one of your many visits, Shoreline All Suites Inn is the absolute classic quality family destination located directly on the beach in Daytona Beach Shores. I've been going to Daytona for 54 years and this "Pearl on the Beach" is truly what Daytona's reputation for clean family vacations was built on. From the finely manicured lawn and beautiful flora to the sparkling clean swimming pool and its surroundings, this is truly a family oriented resort. The rooms and suites are finely appointed and kept extremely clean. And, the staff is more than ready to serve you with a gracious and welcoming attitude. One vacation stay at Shoreline and you will want to make this your family vacation destination from now on.

Reviews.Title: “Great Reasonable Family Operated Hotel”
Reviews.Author: racer3232
Reviews.Content: Family operated, well kept and very clean, very friendly people. We have been coming here for the past 5 or 6 years and feel it is the best place we have ever stayed at in Daytona. My in-laws live in Tavares Florida, and make trips up to this Hotel in the summer time, and have never been disappointed. Extremely good value for the price. Bill Krellner

Reviews.Title: “loved it”
Reviews.Author: pzbear
Reviews.Content: I could not believe how nice managment was after having a terrible experience in Pamana City Beach, last year. The staff could not have been nicer and the rooms were super clean. Great location, right on the beach. We plan on going back every year

Reviews.Title: “Best Stay In The Shores”
Reviews.Author: Inland5
Reviews.Content: I would highly recommend the Shoreline! My family and I just returned home from a week long stay. It was a great experience from the time we arrived till we had to leave. The staff was very helpful and courteous. Location was ideal with minature golf across the street, I-Hop restraunt and Winn Dixie grocery store just a short drive upshore. Our effiencey apartment was clean and well maintained. Although not oceanfront we only had a short walk out the door and down to the beach. We only used the pool once but it was very clean and never crowed during our entire stay. Parking is somewhat limited but upon returning every night from eating we always found a spot or two. All in all we loved the "Shoreline" and they will be our first choice for our return trip to Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome stay”
Reviews.Author: Ikeone
Reviews.Content: We stayed here last weekend.We had originally booked a hotel which of course had downgraded our room so we got our money back and managed to stay here.All i have to say is it was heaven.....from the friendly staff to the clean room and the view and being right on the beach blew us away.This is how vacations should be and we go to Daytona a lot and this place is just like a breath of fresh air ..can't wait till our next weekend away and when that happens shoreline here we come Paula and Jim Bennett Winter Haven Fla

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Modest, Quiet”
Reviews.Author: photic
Reviews.Content: My husband and I along with 2 young teens recently spent a week in a "Garden View Suite". I loved it. I was happy to get a suite - 2 bedrooms each with a bath room and a kitchen/living room for less than many hotels right on the beach charge for one room. The rooms were modest, but clean and in good condition. The teens took the room with the twin bed and a full sized bed. They liked having their own bathroom, There was a small TV on the dresser. Our bed room had a queen size bed - but no TV. (the second TV was in the kitchen/living room) That was a disappointment to my husband, but once we each purchased a good book, we enjoyed reading in bed and didn't miss the television too much. The kitchen had just enough dishes and cookware to allow me to cook many meals in our suite. I was also told that you can ask the front desk for some extra things. For me, It was just enough to cook and serve everything I needed to. There also is a gas barbecue available for guests to use. I can't emphisize enough that the rooms and the grounds were clean. The staff was wonderful. A small continental breakfast was set out in the lobby every morning starting at 8am( fruit, donuts, coffee, hot chocolate and tea). There is a laundry room on site. Bring your own detergent and quarters. (the office can give you change) There is also a shuffelboard court and a heated pool. There was no housekeeping on the Sunday we were there - a note was posted on the office door the evening before. (the note also stated that clean towels were available from the office). On a positive note , they were updating several rooms while we were there, installing new carpet etc. This hotel is not for you if you want room service, like big hotels or like to be around crowds. It's not for you if you fell like you have to have a hotel attendant available. The office closes at 6pm daily and opens at 8am so you can't contact them then. My teens enjoyed their stay very much they indicated that they would have preferred a larger hotel with a lobby, a restaurant and other places to explore. I liked it very much and highly recommend if you like to get away from the crowds and if have simple needs. The hotel quest and staff were all friendly. It's a quiet place to stay will most like love this hotel is you like the "road less traveled".

Reviews.Title: “I wish this was my backyard!”
Reviews.Author: JJH_10
Reviews.Content: Great place for a family vacation. It seems most of the people staying here have been coming back to this place all their life! 2 and 3 generations! I can see why. A cottage on Daytona beach with the ocean just steps away is pretty tough to beat. The cottage we stayed in had a kitchen/dining room, 2 nice sized bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 TV's, dvd which was great for kids / parents. Fullsized appliances in the kitchen with stove, fridge, coffee maker and microwave lets you eat in when you are sick of restaraunts or feel like having a picnic on the beach. There are bar-b-ques available if you want to grill your own steak or hotdogs. There is laundry onsite which we found very handy. Loved not having to wait for an elevator and the free parking. Noticed that this is one of the few places on the beach with afternoon sun as most of the buildings along the beach are highrises which cast shadows in the afternoon. Our housekeeper was Melinda and she took very good care of us. All the staff were very friendly. Coffee, tea, fresh fruit and donuts are in the lobby every morning at 8:00. Very nice pool with lounging area. Always clean and warm. The beach has beautiful sand and goes for miles. We would go shell hunting every day. The kids absolutely loved it and are still asking to go back! As a matter of fact, I wish I was still there! Can't wait to go back. JJ Cambridge, Ontario

Reviews.Title: “Can't Wait Until Next Year!”
Reviews.Author: cher2010
Reviews.Content: This was our 3rd March break at the Shoreline. It was such a great week! Our kids had so much fun at the pool! The pool was always clean and warm even when the weather was cool. Our room was amazing...we had an ocean front room only steps away from the beach. Every morning we had breakfast over looking the ocean. As always we had excellent service. Thanks again to the staff and Frank at the hotel:) We can't wait until next year! Cheryl Kitchener, Ontario

Reviews.Title: “You Must Stay Here”
Reviews.Author: queens9301
Reviews.Content: My Soon to Be Husband and I booked our Stay through www.DaytonaShoreline.com for December 20th-24th 2009. We were really nervous about what was to expect because of some reviews at other hotels. We decided not to stay at where we origionaly booked into and stayed at The Cottages. My Mom whom is a Daytona Beach Resident told us about this place and she suggested it. So we follwed her suggestion and emailed (Frank) the General Manager of the Shoreline and the Cottages. He responded back that he would be most able to have us. He also told us that his staff would have the up most cleanest room and the upmost friendly smiles. As we arrvied we were greeted with a Warm Welcome. My Mom was in our Car with us and visiting us. My Mom follwed us to our room wich was condo unit 44. My Mom checked into our room and she loved it as much as we did. When they told us it was ocean view it was more like you were almost ocean front. I have seen a glimse into the shorline Suites and I suggest staying in the Cottages as they give you more privacy. If Petra is your Maid she will do her best by making everything clean and even chaging the bed sheets even when they don't need to be changed. Frank The Owner is awsome. He knows everyone by name and he does so well by that. The Front Desk agents under him are also wonderful. Also do not book directly with the staff book it online as we were advised which was to book it online and you save moe money in the long run. They do have guest Laundry it is located on the shoreline side. Parking is tight but can be Managed. News Paper Everymorning as well as the Breakfast located in the Lobby Area. It is just Doughnuts, Fruit and Coffie. Other than that they are an awsome staff

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Stay”
Reviews.Author: SungodessMontreal
Reviews.Content: We stayed in an oceanfront cottage August 19-26.The view could not be beat. Outside of our room were two adirondack chairs as well as two padded loungers. The room was very clean and charming with a well-equipped kitchenette. A short walk down the well-manicured lawn brings you to the pool surrounded by a tasteful sea-themed mural. The private lawn area affords a good view of the beach with ample tables with awnings and lounge chairs. Steps bring you to the public beach which is always clean and very family friendly. Cars are allowed to drive on the beach during low tide but are not a nuisance as I had expected. They drive slowly and quietly and there really isn't a lot of traffic. The owner, Frank, is always pleasant and helpful as is his staff.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place, would stay again.”
Reviews.Author: atcmom
Reviews.Content: The Shoreline Suites is a small family run hotel. The rooms open up outside and you have two chairs outside your door. The windows open up, so in the morning while I was cooking I could open the windows and front door and have the kids play in the grass outside. Everyone was nice, both the guests as well as the staff. The room was as described. The room wasn't as clean as I would like, as far as the deep cleaning is. For example, the bathroom sink was pretty grungy and there was mold in the shower. Overall though it was clean enough. All surface areas as well as the floors were cleaned nicely. It is a great place to stay with kids b/c it is so easy to get out and walk to the beach, no elevators, etc.... I would definitely stay there again and the kids can't wait to go back.

Reviews.Title: “Nicer than a apt style hotel”
Reviews.Author: Stimpson
Reviews.Content: This was a very nice stay. After a slight issue with expedia booking (always call the hotel a day before to ensure they got the booking), everything was smooth and relaxing. The mgmt aims to please and are very accommodating. If you can, rent a beachfront cottage they are awesome. You will have a little cottage approximately 70 m from the beach and 40m from the pool. I believe there are 4 of them. The garden cottages are the next best followed by the row suites. In the cottage you will have a full kitchen with fridge and stove. There are also a few bbqs for all to use. We made some nice meals while we were there and saved a lot of money not eating out. The location on the strip is nice as well close to some decent restaurants and some junk stores. There was a grocery store about a 5 min drive from the hotel. There is laundry on site which is convenient as I find I need to do it a lot when I am at the beach. There is free wireless but it is broadcast from the front desk. I found I couldn't get it from inside the cottages. The cottages are a neat take on accommodation in daytona and there is nothing else in the area that compared. You won't regret your stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Love the ocean front cottages”
Reviews.Author: byukat
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have been going here since 2003. We have always stayed in an ocean front cottage. I have NEVER seen any type of roach or any kind of bug during our stay. The towels are changed every day and not sure how many times they change your sheets, mop the floors and clean bathroom. The only problem we had was this year. Last year while there we booked for this year, always the same cottage. When we got there they told us that there were people staying in "our" cottage for another week and we would have to take the cottage that was reserved for them. I felt this was very unfair. Frank took the blame, but still did not ease my disappointment. I found out while there that the regulars that book for the following year do not get the same disount offered on their website - 1 free night. You can't beat the view or cleanliness. The outdoor furniture needed to be replaced when we were there - not sure if Frank has any intention of doing so, as he leases the property now.

Reviews.Title: “Used to be great, but NEVER AGAIN!”
Reviews.Author: Caesarsparents
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed here three times prior, in 1999, 2000 and 2004 and always loved it here. The amenities, pool and price are great. We were very disappointed this time to wake up to giant palmetto cockroaches in the room. Sorry folks, but that is completely unacceptable to me and a complete dealbreaker. It wasn't exactly pleasant in the middle of our vacation to have to pack up and change hotels. They tried to brush it off as "this is Florida" or "maybe you left your door open too much". But I don't think so! We are very careful about never leaving our doors open, and sorry, but the "this is Florida" comment is ridiculous. We have stayed in florida too many times without bugs to accept that as a justification! We moved to the HIlton, although more expensive, no bugs there! And what great service.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: katenicole
Reviews.Content: Well it started out with me not being totally sure if my husband and I should stay here on our vacation since there was not very many reviews about Shoreline. But their website had good info and the prices were great so we decided to give it a try and I am very happy with our decision. We stayed there from August 19th-Aug 23rd. We didn't stay a whole week b/c we were staying with family the rest of our vacation. Once it came time to check out we didn't want to leave! When we first arrived around 5 pm the lady behind the desk (if she reads this , i am sorry but i can't remember your name) gave us a warm welcome and she was very friendly. We checked in and she gave us our room key. When i originally booked our room i booked a garden view (which garden view is basically the grass and some pretty flowers) one bedroom suite which was the same price as the cottage. When you first walk in there is a small living room with a couch, TV, and the kitchen area all in one room. THen you walk into the bedroom which has a full bed and a twin bed and the bathroom is off the bedroom. We went into our room to check it out and it was nice. For the price that we paid per night it was a great deal. But I started thinking that i wanted to look at the cottage b/c it has a queen bed. We have a queen bed at home so i don't know what i was thinking booking a room with only a full size bed. (who wants to downsize on vacation) =) So we went to the front desk and asked the lady if there were any cottages open for the time that we would be staying there and she said there was one open. She gave us the key so we could go look at it before we made a final decision but told me that its cute and that girls ususally like it better. So we went to the garden view cottage and as soon as we opened the door I loved it (my husband liked it better as well) So we went back and told her that we wanted to change to the cottage. And she made some quick changes to our paperwork and then we went back to the cottage to unload our stuff. When we walked into the cottage it is just one big room with the bed right in the middle. The bathroom was off to the left and a full kitchen was off to the right. It was perfect for us. Everything was VERY clean and that is important to us. The only complaint I have was that there was a small lizard in our room the first night and then also the next morning (but i guess we could expect that being in florida) Luckily I had some bug spray so i sprayed it along the bottom of the door and around the floor a bit and we had no more visitors after that. Our first morning there we went to check out the continental breakfast. It is located in the office. They had coffee and tea and also different flavors that you could use. They also had doughnuts and fruit. Not a huge selection but the fruit was good and the coffee with caramel flavoring was great. The view of the beach was so beautiful!! And the pool was awsome!! A lot of people said that we were crazy for going to florida in August but in my opinion it was the perfect week to be there b/c of kids going back to school. We pretty much had the pool to ourselves every day. The pool area was clean as well. There was plenty of chairs to lounge in the sun. And outside the pool area there was a picnic type area with tables and more chairs. Overall we were very happy with our stay at Shoreline and we would stay there again in the future. If you are looking for a 5 star high class hotel then this might not be the place for you. But if you are looking for an inexpensive, clean, great place to just relax and enjoy the sun then this is what you are looking for. I have several more photos. Please contact me and I can email them to you.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the solitude”
Reviews.Author: StayaStar
Reviews.Content: This place was probably built in the 1970's. The bathroom was very tiny and only had a shower. But the beds were comfy and the kitchenette was decent size (has a full size fridge, gas stove, oven, and microwave, plus all the dishes and pans you'll need). I would definitely stay here again because the pool and beach were gorgeous. The "garden view" is basically grass and sidewalk but who goes to the beach to see a garden?? We went in Sept. and had the pool to ourselves. A fun, old fashioned place to stay if you want to avoid crowds and slow elevators. A word of advice, get to the continental breakfast early or you'll be eating the crappy doughnuts.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Shoreline!”
Reviews.Author: CanadaSmiley
Reviews.Content: I was worried about staying here after reading the particularly negative review posted a while back but was delighted to find that the Shoreline offered exactly what I was seeking--a cozy, relaxing, private cabin, a beautiful heated pool and direct beach access. My Mother and I walked the beach for hours and, as far as we could tell, this is the only place on Daytona Beach where you can rent a cottage to yourself. The inn is divided into two parts, individual cabins and duplexes with one shared wall. The kitchenettes were fully stocked with dishes and relatively new appliances. There was also a breakfast nook, a separate bedroom and bathroom in our lodging. They deliver the local paper to your door every morning. We would walk into the office and pick up some Florida oranges (there's no matching the taste of the local fruit) and bananas and head down to the deck to read the paper in peace. It was lovely. The deck looks out directly onto Daytona Beach and is always in the sun (as is the pool) because the inn, possessing only one level, doesn't tower over the lawn in the same way its neighbours do. That's another thing-there is a large grass-covered lawn surrounding the place, an asset found nowhere else on the beach except in front of private homes. We enjoyed the fact that we had so much space and could swim and sun ourselves whenever we desired. I too enjoyed the proximity of the inn to the "Top of Daytona" restaurant, a glassed-in eatery on the 29th floor of a condominium building. The Top of Daytona offers good food, 360 degree views of the waterfront and early bird pricing before 6:00pm. The parking is slightly puzzling. You leave your vehicle outside of the building (whereas the residents park inside) and enter through a door (you can't miss it) inside the parking garage, where an elevator will take you directly to the top floor. I would also recommend the shrimp at the little diner on the pier nearby the hotel. As for attractions, we enjoyed ourselves at the mini-golf place across the street from the Shoreline. We also took in the Ponce de Leon Inlet Lighthouse and Museum and the trails in behind the lighthouse, which I believe were linked to a science centre. The nearby lighthouse restaurant was full of character and offered all sorts of local seafood. They warn you, however, that there are no preservatives and everything is made from scratch so you'd best be prepared to sit back and relax.

Reviews.Title: “So Relaxing!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay here so much, we have booked our next trip for May 2006. The staff is very attentive, rooms are clean and the view is breathtaking. The pool area is great. Can't wait for this year's trip.....This is a great place to get away from it all...

Reviews.Title: “Fell In Love”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We absolutely fell in love with The Shoreline vacation spot the minute we stepped on the grounds, and our enthusiasm never diminished. Enjoyable, lovely, and tons of fun. The cottages are cozy and well kept; the grounds are beautiful. Thank you for a most wonderful 5 days. We have already booked for next year -- that's how great it is!!

Reviews.Title: “wonderful vacation”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Shoreline Inn on June 2-June 9th, 2004. Wonderful experience!!! We checked in late at night, our key was waiting for us as promised. We checked into a regular room as planned and then moved to the penthouse the next day. We have two teenage daughters and the penthouse was perfect. We had stayed in the big high rise hotel last summer, and wanted to experience the "old" atmosphere. The Shoreline is an older establishment, but the service was very friendly and helpful. We loved that our daughters could come and go to the room without being in our constant sight. The week we were there it was totally family friendly. You can go from the deck of the pool area right onto the beach. If you do go, I would recommend the penthouse. It is upstairs, but the view is lovely and it is very spacious. I was concern about the drive-on beach, however, the area we were in was not much of an issue. Yes, it is drive-on, but toward the Shoreline it is not as busy and it is very monitored. They have rental business to rent 4-wheels or golf carts. Also, to rent body boards. Not to expensive. Lots of fun. Hope this helps others. We did enjoy it very much.

HotelInfo.Name: Shoreline All Suites Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 2435 South Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
